backend/main.mo: Main actor for the Success Test Series Hub backend, defining data types (Test, Student, Ranker, etc.) and managing state maps for tests, students, rankers, sessions, and contact submissions, with admin/student authentication and access control mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that upgrades the persistent student state by adding a `password` field (defaulting to empty string) to the existing OldStudent records during canister upgrades.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking two implemented features — React Query hooks for student login/register and the replacement of the OTP-based StudentLogin page with a mobile+password form — to their relevant files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: A JSON-formatted text file containing short summaries of all frontend source files, describing their purpose, styling approach, and notable implementation details.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS entry file that defines OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes, including background, foreground, chart, and sidebar tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the React SPA, setting the page title to 'Success Test Series Hub' and mounting the app at `#root` via `src/main.tsx`.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that implements client-side routing via `window.history.pushState`, rendering pages (home, admin, admin-dashboard, student-login, student-dashboard) and wrapping the app in `LanguageProvider`.
frontend/src/components/AdminSidebar.tsx: Renders the admin panel sidebar with navigation links to all admin sections and handles logout by calling the logout mutation and clearing the session token.
AI test generator section component that accepts a topic and difficulty level, calls the `generateQuestions` mutation with an admin session token, and displays the generated questions with bilingual (EN/HI) support.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Displays a contact form with name, email, and message fields; submits via the useSubmitContact mutation and shows a success state upon completion.
frontend/src/components/CurrentAffairsFo: Modal dialog for admins to add a new current affairs entry with a date and content field, using the useAddCurrentAffairs mutation.
frontend/src/components/DailyCurrentAffa: Fetches and displays a date-sorted list of current affairs entries in a scrollable card using the useGetCurrentAffairs query.
frontend/src/components/DailyNewspaper.t: Fetches and displays a date-sorted list of daily newspaper entries with external read links using the useGetNewspapers query.
frontend/src/components/ExamCategories.t: Renders a row of filterable exam category buttons (UPSC, SSC, etc.) with per-category accent colors and active/hover styling.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer displaying the logo, copyright year, privacy/terms links, and a caffeine.ai attribution with a heart icon.
frontend/src/components/FreeTests.tsx: Displays a list of free tests (price === 0) fetched via useGetTests, showing category labels, question count, estimated duration, and a button to launch a TestTakingModal.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky navigation header with logo, smooth-scroll nav links, EN/HI language toggle, and a Student Login button; supports both desktop and mobile (hamburger) layouts.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Landing hero section with headline, subheadline, CTA buttons to scroll to free tests or paid plans, and a three-stat grid (students, tests, categories).
frontend/src/components/ImageSlider.tsx: Auto-advancing image carousel that fetches slides via useGetSliders, with prev/next buttons, dot indicators, and a 4-second auto-play interval.
frontend/src/components/NewspaperFormMod: Modal dialog form for adding a newspaper entry (date + URL) using the useAddNewspaper mutation, with basic validation and loading state.
frontend/src/components/PaidTestSeries.t: Displays three static pricing plan cards (Basic, Standard, Premium) alongside paid tests filtered from useGetTests, with feature lists and purchase buttons.
frontend/src/components/PaidTestWizard.t: A multi-step wizard component (4 steps: Basic Info, Questions, Settings, Review) for creating or editing paid tests, supporting form validation, negative marking configuration, and bilingual question input.
frontend/src/components/PaymentComingSoo: A dialog component that displays a 'Payment Coming Soon' message with the test title and price, used as a placeholder before payment integration is available.
A reusable component for managing a list of quiz questions with support for adding, removing, reordering, expanding/collapsing, and editing bilingual (English/Hindi) question fields and options.
A modal dialog form for adding a new ranker entry with student name, exam category, and score fields, submitting via the useAddRanker mutation.
A modal dialog form for adding a new image slider entry with a required image URL and optional title, submitting via the useAddSlider mutation.
frontend/src/components/TestFormModal.ts: A modal dialog form for creating or editing a test, including title, exam category, price, negative marking, and a list of questions with bilingual support, using add/update test mutations.
A modal component that renders a test with multiple-choice questions, handles answer selection, calculates scores with optional negative marking, and displays results with per-question explanations after submission.
frontend/src/components/TopRankers.tsx: Displays a leaderboard table of top-ranked students fetched via `useGetTopRankers`, with rank-specific color coding and icons for the top three positions.
frontend/src/components/WhyChooseUs.tsx: A static section component that renders four feature cards (AI questions, adaptive tests, live proctoring, analytics) with translated titles and descriptions.
frontend/src/contexts/LanguageContext.ts: Provides a React context for language selection ('en' or 'hi') with persistence to localStorage, exposing `language` and `setLanguage` via `useLanguage` hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an ICP backend actor using React Query, initializing it with the current Internet Identity and invalidating dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Provides utilities for managing an admin session token in localStorage, including get/set/clear helpers and a `useSessionToken` hook that syncs state across storage events.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity authentication provider and hook using DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all React Query hooks for the application, covering public data fetching (tests, rankers, sliders, current affairs, newspapers) and mutations for admin/student authentication and profile management.
frontend/src/hooks/useStudentAuth.ts: Provides utilities for managing student authentication tokens and names in localStorage, including getter/setter/clear functions, legacy aliases, and a React hook that reactively tracks auth state changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useTranslation.ts: A React hook that returns a translation function `t` using the current language from LanguageContext, falling back to English if a key is missing.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports fonts, sets up Tailwind, and defines a deep navy/gold/sky design system via CSS custom properties and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminContacts.tsx: Admin page for viewing contact form submissions; currently shows a placeholder/empty state because the backend API for retrieving submissions is not yet available.
frontend/src/pages/AdminCurrentAffairs.t: Admin page for managing current affairs entries, supporting listing (sorted by date), adding via a modal, and deleting entries using backend query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard shell that renders the sidebar and routes to the appropriate admin sub-panel based on the current path, redirecting to login if no session token exists.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLogin.tsx: Admin login page with a username/password form that calls the login mutation, stores the session token on success, and navigates to the admin dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/AdminNewspapers.tsx: Admin page for managing daily newspaper link entries, supporting listing (sorted by date), adding via a modal, and deleting entries with external link previews.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPaidTests.tsx: Admin page for managing paid tests (price > 0), displaying them in a table with options to add, edit, or delete via a wizard modal and confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/pages/AdminRankers.tsx: Admin page for managing the leaderboard, showing a table of top rankers with rank-styled rows and options to add or delete rankers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminSliders.tsx: Admin page for managing homepage image sliders, displaying a grid of slider previews with options to add new sliders or delete existing ones.
frontend/src/pages/AdminStudents.tsx: Admin page that lists all registered students in a table showing their profile photo, mobile number, ID, and registration date.
frontend/src/pages/AdminTests.tsx: Admin page for managing all exam tests, displaying a table with test details and providing add, edit, and delete functionality via a modal.
frontend/src/pages/StudentDashboard.tsx: Student-facing dashboard page showing the student's profile with photo upload capability, logout functionality, and navigation to other student sections.
frontend/src/pages/StudentLogin.tsx: React page component providing tabbed Login and Register forms for students using mobile number and password, with validation, error handling, and navigation to the student dashboard on success.
frontend/src/utils/examCategories.ts: Utility module exporting display labels (English and Hindi), dropdown options, and badge accent colors for each ExamCategory enum value.
frontend/src/utils/translations.ts: Centralized i18n translation strings for English and (implied) Hindi UI text covering navigation, hero section, tests, rankers, contact, and other app sections.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL query parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining a dark navy/gold design system with custom colors, fonts, shadows, border radii, keyframe animations, and plugin integrations (typography, container-queries, animate).
project_state.json: Project state metadata tracking existing implemented features and pending new feature requests for the STS Hub app, specifically around student password-based authentication.
